attributes.action: Resign immediately over his refusal to allow a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This unelected PM has reneged on a manifesto promise and has now in the name of politics forced through ratification of a treaty which installs an un-elected EU President , and makes our own elected politicians subservient to Brussels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
